title: Lupin III: Ai no Da Capo - Fujiko's Unlucky Days (Dub)
alternative_title: Lupin III: The Columbus Files, ルパン三世『愛のダ・カーポ ～Fujiko's Unlucky Days』
description: When Fujiko acquires and memorizes papers called the Columbus Files, she is attacked and loses her memory. Lupin, a treasure hunter named Rosaria, and the cackling villain Nazaroff all pursue Fujiko, as she is the only key to the location of Columbus' Egg, a treasure connected to the mysterious Orgone Energy.
